name: use-toggle
description: Controls a boolean state with a toggle function.
title: guara hooks

properties.name: toggle
properties.description: is a function that toggles the state between true and false .

features.title: onToggle Callback
bullets: The onToggle callback is called every time the state changes, with the new value as its argument.
The callback is called after the state is updated.

features.title: Returned Values
bullets: The hook returns a tuple: [value, toggle] .
value is the current boolean state.
toggle is a function that toggles the state between true and false .

features.title: Initial Value
bullets: The initialValue prop sets the initial state (defaults to false ).

features.title: Best Practices & Caveats
bullets: The hook is designed for toggling boolean state in React components.
For best performance, memoize the onToggle callback if it depends on other values.
